title: Step 1: Creating a page
content:
There are several ways to create a page on XWiki. Please find below all available ways

* [Using the Create button](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage#HUsingtheCreatebutton)
* [Using in page links](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage#HUsinginpagelinks)
* [Directly entering the URL for the new page](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage#HDirectlyenteringtheURLforthenewpage)

# Using the Create button

First, click on the create icon:

[![create-icon.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage/create-icon.png?width=100&rev=1.2)](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage/create-icon.png?rev=1.2)

Then you will see this screen:

[![create-formular.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage/create-formular.png?width=650&rev=1.4)](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage/create-formular.png?rev=1.4)

Here, you can set a title and select the type of document you want to create.

# Using in page links

Links can be used as pointers towards pages that do not exist yet. When used for this purpose, a link will appear underlined, with a question mark to its right.

[![create-link.png](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage/create-link.png?width=309&rev=1.1)](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingAPage/create-link.png?rev=1.1)

Clicking on such a link will ask you to select a page type. After you click "Create" you'll see the page in edit mode. The new page will be created when you click on "Save & View". This way of creating new pages is quite handy since it creates your wiki's structure at the same time as the new content is added.

# Directly entering the URL for the new page

This option is technical and not recommended for simple users because it requires knowing the [URL format](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/DevGuide/Architecture/URL%20Architecture/Standard%20URL%20Format/).

**Next: [Step 2 Editing a page](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/EditingAPage)**
